meta.content: Clean & comfortable accommodations located in walking distance from downtown and just 10 minutes from skiing. Book direct for our best rates!

td.onclick: var navobj = document.getElementsByClassName('nav-ul')[0]; if (navobj.className.indexOf('expanded')>0) navobj.className = navobj.className.replace('mobile-expanded',''); else navobj.className += ' mobile-expanded';

div.h1: Local family owned and operated! We're here 24/7!
div.h4: Call & find out how to receive a 50% discounted night!!!

div.h1: Family owned and operated! On site 24/7!
div.h4: Call & find out how to receive a 50% discounted night!!!

div.h1: Family owned and operated! On site 24/7!
div.h4: Call & find out how to receive a 50% discounted night!!!

div.h2: Welcome to the Red Lodge Inn

div.p: Located on the south end of town, across from Rock Creek. We are within walking distance of downtown Red Lodge, Montana and 6 miles to down hill and cross country skiing!

em.strong: Stay any 2 consecutive nights with us Nov 15, 2019-February 29,2020 and receive your 3rd night 50% off!!! MUST call for discount! Discount is only good once per stay. Discount is NOT valid on holidays!!
Beginning January 1, 2020 our pet fee is $30. We have only a limited number of pet rooms. Please CALL to ensure you have a pet friendly room.

img.p: We strive to provide an exceptional level of service for every guest, and are proud to have a 4.5-star rating on TripAdvisor.

div.div:
811 South Broadway, Red Lodge, MT59068, United States
P: (406) 446-2030
E:redlodgeinn@gmail.com

p.a: Simple Software for Innkeepers by Odysys
